archimate:Requirement.name: MA-4(1): Nonlocal Maintenance | Logging and Review
archimate:Requirement.documentation: (a) Log [Assignment: organization-defined audit events] for nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic sessions; and (b) Review the audit records of the maintenance and diagnostic sessions to detect anomalous behavior.

properties.value: Audit logging for nonlocal maintenance is enforced by AU-2. Audit events are defined in AU-2a.
